facts.1: National Girlfriends Day is celebrated on August 1st to honor the special bond between female friends.
facts.2: The day encourages women to spend quality time with their girlfriends and appreciate their friendship.
facts.3: Activities on this day often include going out for meals, shopping, and enjoying fun activities together.

facts.1: National Raspberry Cream Pie Day celebrates the delicious dessert made with fresh raspberries and a creamy filling.
facts.2: Raspberries are rich in vitamins, antioxidants, and fiber, making them a healthy addition to desserts.
facts.3: The day encourages people to bake and enjoy raspberry cream pies with family and friends.

facts.1: World Lung Cancer Day is observed on August 1st to raise awareness about lung cancer and its impact on individuals and families.
facts.2: Lung cancer is the leading cause of cancer-related deaths worldwide, highlighting the importance of early detection and treatment.
facts.3: The day promotes education, research, and support for those affected by lung cancer.
